content.text: 2 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil" )

content.text: 6 (6 inch) corn tortillas, cut into 1/2 inch strips
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "6 (6 inch) corn tortillas, cut into 1/2 inch strips" )

content.text: 3 cups chicken broth
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "3 cups chicken broth" )

content.text: 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1/2 teaspoon ground cumin" )

content.text: 1/2 teaspoon chili powder
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1/2 teaspoon chili powder" )

content.text: 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1/2 teaspoon dried oregano" )

content.text: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained" )

content.text: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained" )

content.text: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces" )

content.text: 1/2 cup salsa
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1/2 cup salsa" )

content.text: 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro" )

content.text: 0) Heat 2 teaspoons of the oil in a large pot over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "2 teaspoons of the oil"@8:30 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large pot"@34:45 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@51:62 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add half of the tortilla strips, stirring often, until crisp.
2) Drain on paper towels.
3) Repeat with remaining 1/2 teaspoon of oil and remaining tortilla strips and set aside.
4) Add the broth, cumin, chili powder and oregano to the pot.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the broth"@7:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cumin"@18:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "chili powder"@25:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "oregano"@42:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( tool-4-0 "the pot"@53:60 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Raise heat to high and bring to a boil.
6) Add the beans, corn, chicken and salsa.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the beans"@7:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "corn"@18:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "chicken"@24:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "salsa"@36:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Reduce heat to low, stir and simmer for about 2 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and no longer pink inside.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Reduce"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-7-0 "heat"@10:14 / TOOL )
		:gol ( temp-7-0 "low"@18:21 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "stir"@23:27 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-2 "simmer"@32:38 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-7-1 "low"@18:21 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "about 2 minutes"@43:58 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until chicken is cooked through and no longer pink inside"@63:120 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Add the cilantro and half of the reserved tortilla strips.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "the cilantro"@7:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "half of the reserved tortilla strips"@24:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Ladle into individual bowls and garnish each bowl with some of the remaining strips.
